transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan, aap dobara connect kar liya.

Customer: Haan sir aap link pe click to kijiye sir aap join hi nahi aa rahe is samay.

Executive: Are maine to kiya hua hai isliye aapko dobara disconnect kar kar zara.

Customer: Haan sir, main dobara link send karu kya sir?

Executive: Dobara bhejiye.

Executive: Theek hai, main link dobara bhej raha hu sir.


Executive: Sir send kiya sir, check kijiye aur dobara join kijiye.

Customer: Abhi aaya nahi hai, Manish ji.

Executive: Ji sir send ho gaya hai aapke whatsapp pe.

Customer: Are mujhe receive nahi hua.

Executive: Lagta hai network issue hai kya sir aapke yaha pe?

Customer: Ho sakta hai is samay ho.

Executive: Haan kyuki whatsapp pe double tick nahi aa raha sir aapke.

Executive: Network issue lag raha hai sir mujhe aapke yaha pe.


Executive: Pehle sir jab aapne click kiya tab aap join hue the fir aap achanak se aap chale gaye the sir usme, main jab tak aaya.

Customer: [inaudible]

Executive: Send to maine kar diya, lag raha hai network issue hai sir aapke yaha.

Customer: Rukiye rukiye.

Executive: Haan.

Customer: Na spam mein aa raha hai na inbox mein aa raha hai.

Executive: Nahi sir whatsapp pe kiya hai sir.

Customer: Whatsapp pe nahi mat kariye whatsapp pe nahi uthate hain.

Executive: Achha sir to ye aapki mail id hai, main bata deta hu. Nihalnd@yahoo.com ispe kiya hai sir.

Customer: Ispe abhi to kiye nahi thodi der pehle aap.

Executive: Haan sir uspe usse maine kiya tha to usme nahi aa raha.

Customer: Ek minute dekh rahe hain kahan chala gaya wo.

Executive: Haan sir IndiaMART ke name se aaya hua hai sir aapko. 

Customer: Haan haan IndiaMART ka bhi aaya to tha.

Executive: Nai link bheju kya sir dobara se, nai bheju kya?

Customer: Kah do na isko dobara bhej dijiye ek baar.

Executive: Theek hai theek hai ab line pe rahiye main dobara. Nahi nahi ek Manish ke naam se hai yehi hai na?

Customer: Haan Manish yes sir.

Customer: Haan kar liya maine.


Customer: Join kar liya.

Executive: Screen dikh rahi hai sir meri?

Customer: Nahi nahi. Nahi aap abhi aap join nahi hue sir.

Customer: Maine apna process to pura kar liya.

Executive: Isme sir aa nahi rahe aap. Main ek kaam karta hu new link bhej raha hu sir, theek hai?

Customer: Haan bhejiye shayad purana ho gaya isliye.

Executive: Main new link bhej raha hu ye cancel kar raha hu sir.



Executive: Ab dekhiye sir, dobara aaya hai sir.

Customer: Dekhta hu.

Executive: Haan sir.

Customer: Problem ye hai ki har baar aapka spam mein chala jata hai.

Customer: Ab isko pehle.

Executive: Theek hai whatsapp se kar lijiye sir join.

Customer: Whatsapp pe maine bataya hai kya pehle bhi aapko ki jab tak main baat karta rahunga whatsapp nahi.

Executive: To nahi call cut karke main link bhej deta hu na whatsapp pe aapko.

Customer: Nahi link to bhej denge uske baad kya hoga? Baat nahi ho payegi na.

Executive: Nahi link pe click karna hai sir uske baad aap join ho jayenge na.

Customer: Rukiye rukiye isi isi karna.


Customer: Isme kya batana hai aap bataiye to aise bhi hum log baat kar sakte hain.

Executive: Nahi sir link aapko video meet pe aapko dikhana padega na TrustSeal ka pura process is vajah se.

Customer: TrustSeal ka process. Haan TrustSeal ke kai party se meri baat hui hai unhone kaha koi fayda nahi hota.

Executive: Are ek baar sir mam se baat kar lijiye wo maine unko line pe liya tha ek baar unse baat kar lijiye aapko kya issue aa raha hai unko bata dena sir sab is vajah se maine aur mam ko aap line pe main aapko whatsapp pe send kar raha hu sir whatsapp pe send ki link join kare okay? 

Customer: Whatsapp mein baatein nahi kar payenge. Phone cut jayega.

Executive: Nahi to sound aayega na speaker rahega sir speaker rahega whatsapp pe video call chalega na.

Customer: Chaliye dekhiye aap. Haan whatsapp se join kijiye aap whatsapp whatsapp se join kijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join video meet.

- Customer says TrustSeal has no benefit.



Resolution:

- Executive tried sending link via email and WhatsApp.

- Executive offered to connect with a manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, video meet, whatsapp, email

seller_categories.mcat_name: Polyethylene glycol and Propylene Glycol Eye Drop
